get.summary: Retrieves a set of events related to an application owner based on query parameters.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Id of the latter even that should be included

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The lower limit for when the cloud event was created in UTC

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The upper limit for when the cloud event was created in UTC

parameters.name: party
parameters.description: The party id representing the subjects

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: The organisation number representing the subject

parameters.name: person
parameters.description: The person number representing the subject

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: A list of the event types to include

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The maximum number of events to include in the response

get.summary: Retrieves a set of events related to a party based on query parameters.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Id of the latter event that should be included

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The lower limit for when the cloud event was created in UTC

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The upper limit for when the cloud event was created in UTC

parameters.name: party
parameters.description: The party id representing the subjects

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: The organisation number representing the subject

parameters.name: person
parameters.description: The person number representing the subject

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: A list of the sources to include

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: A list of the event types to include

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The maximum number of events to include in the response

post.summary: Endpoint for posting a new cloud event

Post a previously registered cloudEvent to the inbound events queue
and further processing by the EventsInbound Azure function
Alert push controller about a new event.
post.description:
This method will then identify any matching subscriptions
and verify whether the consumer is authorized to receive each event.
If authorized, the event will be added to the outbound queue.

post.summary: Alert push controller about a new event.
post.description:
This method will then identify any matching subscriptions and authorize if the consumer is authorized
to receive event. If authorized it will put it on a outbound queue

post.summary: Saves a cloud event to persistent storage.

post.description: Requires information about endpoint to post events for subscribers.

get.summary: Get all subscription for the authorized consumer

put.summary: Method to validate an specific subscription. Only avaiable from validation function.

source.description: Gets or sets the source of the event.

specversion.description: Gets or sets the specification version of the event.

type.description: Gets or sets the type of the event.

subject.description: Gets or sets the subject of the event.

alternativesubject.description: Gets or sets the alternative subject of the event.

data.description:
Gets or sets the cloudEvent data content. The event payload.
The payload depends on the type and the dataschema.

dataschema.description:
Gets or sets the cloudEvent dataschema attribute.
A link to the schema that the data attribute adheres to.

AppCloudEventRequestModel.description: The model used in the request for registering a new cloud event.

typeFilter.description: Filter for type. The different sources has different types.

validated.description: Indicate whether the subscription has been validated to be ok.

Subscription.description: Class that describes an events subscription

count.description: The nuber of subscriptions in the list

SubscriptionList.description: An object containing a list of subscriptions and metadata

typeFilter.description: Filter for type. The different sources has different types.

SubscriptionRequestModel.description: Class that describes the events subscription request model
